revised_title: Evolution and Classification of Ficus Subgenus Pharmacosycea in New Caledonia
tldr: The author examines the subgenus Ficus Pharmacosycea, focusing on the species found in New Caledonia. They describe the four evolutionary lines within the subgenus and provide detailed descriptions and illustrations of the species in the series Austrocaledonicae. The author also discusses the biogeography and morphological evolution of the species, as well as the potential for further research in the region.
